queries.query: SELECT lut.description, counts.itemsCount FROM ( SELECT COUNT(bdt.id) AS itemsCount, bdt.discovery_status FROM base_ad_task bdt GROUP BY bdt.discovery_status) counts INNER JOIN lut_host_status lut ON lut.id = counts.discovery_status

SELECT lut.state_name, counts.itemsCount FROM ( SELECT COUNT(bdt.id) AS itemsCount, bdt.state FROM base_ad_task bdt GROUP BY bdt.state) counts INNER JOIN lut_base_adtask_state lut ON lut.id = counts.state

SELECT pi.display_name, counts.itemsCount FROM ( SELECT v.protocol_id,count(v.host_id) AS itemsCount FROM v_host2opt_protocol v GROUP BY v.protocol_id) counts INNER JOIN protocol_info pi ON pi.id = counts.protocol_id

SELECT lut.protocol_name, counts.itemsCount FROM ( SELECT ppi.protocol_type_id, count(v.host_id) AS itemsCount FROM v_host2opt_protocol v INNER JOIN protocol_info ppi ON ppi.id = v.protocol_id INNER JOIN lut_ap_protocol lap ON lap.id = ppi.protocol_type_id GROUP BY ppi.protocol_type_id ) counts INNER JOIN lut_ap_protocol lut ON lut.id = counts.protocol_type_id

query.title: Core entities by discovery result source

queries.query: SELECT drs.key, count(ce.id) FROM core_entity ce INNER JOIN discovery_result_source drs ON drs.id = ce.discovery_result_source_id GROUP BY drs.key

SELECT bdp.name, counts.itemsCount FROM ( SELECT v.policy_id, COUNT(v.host_id) AS itemsCount FROM v_task2host2policy v GROUP BY v.policy_id) counts INNER JOIN base_discovery_policy bdp ON bdp.id = counts.policy_id
